dataset_id: ASTER L1B Registered Radiance at the Sensor V003
title: ASTER L1B Registered Radiance at the Sensor V003
summary: The Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer (ASTER) Level-1B (AST_L1B) Registered Radiance at the Sensor data product is radiometrically calibrated and geometrically co-registered. Application of intra-telescope and inter-telescope registration corrections for all bands are relative to the reference band for each telescope: Visible and Near Infrared (VNIR) Band 2, Shortwave Infrared (SWIR) Band 6, and Thermal Infrared (TIR) Band 11.
